TheVixenMod:Strike_TheVixen.NAME: Strike
TheVixenMod:Strike_TheVixen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Sunny: Apply !M! Burn.

TheVixenMod:HeatWave.NAME: Heat Wave
TheVixenMod:HeatWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Sunny: Apply !M! Burn.

TheVixenMod:Ember.NAME: Ember
TheVixenMod:Ember.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Sunny: Apply !M! Burn.

TheVixenMod:FlameWheel.NAME: Flame Wheel
TheVixenMod:FlameWheel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Block for each Burn on the target. NL Sunny: Repeat this effect once.

TheVixenMod:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
TheVixenMod:Overheat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to yourself. NL Sunny: Increase Weak applied by 1 and damage done by 8.

TheVixenMod:FlareBlitz.NAME: Flare Blitz
TheVixenMod:FlareBlitz.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. NL Sunny: Increase damage dealt by 5.

TheVixenMod:Psybeam.NAME: Psybeam
TheVixenMod:Psybeam.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals NL !D! damage to itself. NL Sunny: Gain Block equal to half the damage dealt.
TheVixenMod:Psybeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals NL !D! damage to itself. NL Sunny: Gain Block equal to the damage dealt.

TheVixenMod:FireSpin.NAME: Fire Spin
TheVixenMod:FireSpin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X*2 times. NL Sunny: Increase X by 1.

TheVixenMod:FlameCharge.NAME: Flame Charge
TheVixenMod:FlameCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Sunny: Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

TheVixenMod:MysticalFire.NAME: Mystical Fire
TheVixenMod:MysticalFire.DESCRIPTION: If you are Weak, remove it and apply as much Vulnerable to the target. NL Sunny or not Weak: Deal !D! damage.
TheVixenMod:MysticalFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you are Weak, remove it and apply as much Vulnerable to the target. NL Sunny or not Weak: Deal !D! damage twice.

TheVixenMod:FireBlast.NAME: Fire Blast
TheVixenMod:FireBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to target enemy and !M! % less to the other ones. NL Exhaust.
TheVixenMod:FireBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to target enemy and !M! % less to the other ones. NL Sunny: Shuffle an unupgraded Fire Blast into your Discard Pile. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:Flamethrower.NAME: Flamethrower
TheVixenMod:Flamethrower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Sunny: Retain your rightmost attack, skill or power.
TheVixenMod:Flamethrower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Apply !M! Burn. NL Sunny: Retain your rightmost attack, skill or power.

TheVixenMod:Swagger.NAME: Swagger
TheVixenMod:Swagger.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals NL !D! damage to itself. NL Until the start of your turn, it gains !M! Strength and takes damage equal to half its damage dealt.

TheVixenMod:ConfuseRay.NAME: Confuse Ray
TheVixenMod:ConfuseRay.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals NL !D! damage to itself NL !M! times. NL Sunny: Enemy takes damage equal to half its damage dealt next turn.

TheVixenMod:Psychic.NAME: Psychic
TheVixenMod:Psychic.DESCRIPTION: All enemies deal !D! damage to themselves. NL Sunny: Gain Block equal to their combined Burn and Strength.
TheVixenMod:Psychic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All enemies deal !D! damage to themselves. NL Gain Block equal to their combined Burn and Strength.

TheVixenMod:FlameBurst.NAME: Flame Burst
TheVixenMod:FlameBurst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy isn't burned, apply !M! Burn. NL Otherwise, gain 1 Sunny Day.

TheVixenMod:Facade.NAME: Facade
TheVixenMod:Facade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat this for every unique common debuff on you ( !DBNUM! ).
TheVixenMod:Facade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat this for every unique common debuff on you ( !DBNUM! ). NL Sunny: Unaffected by Weak.

TheVixenMod:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
TheVixenMod:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to all enemies equal to the target's Burn. NL Until the end of your next turn the first burn it receives is increased by its current burn. NL Not Sunny: Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:LavaPlume.NAME: Lava Plume
TheVixenMod:LavaPlume.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times to a random enemy. NL Sunny: Apply 2 Burn to each target hit.

TheVixenMod:Hex.NAME: Hex
TheVixenMod:Hex.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to an enemy equal to the cumulative duration of its debuffs (burn only once), times the amount of unique debuffs on them.
TheVixenMod:Hex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to an enemy equal to the cumulative duration of its debuffs (burn only once), times the amount of unique debuffs + 1 on them.

TheVixenMod:ShadowBall.NAME: Shadow Ball
TheVixenMod:ShadowBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Sunny or NL Weak target: NL Gain [E] and NL draw !M! card.
TheVixenMod:ShadowBall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Sunny or NL Weak target (stacks): NL Gain [E] and NL draw !M! card.

TheVixenMod:SolarBeam.NAME: Solar Beam
TheVixenMod:SolarBeam.DESCRIPTION: Consume all your Sunny Day. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each stack consumed ( !SUN! ).
TheVixenMod:SolarBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Sunny Day, then consume all your Sunny Day. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies for each stack consumed ( !SUN! ).

TheVixenMod:Psyshock.NAME: Psyshock
TheVixenMod:Psyshock.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals !D! damage to itself X times. NL Gain X Sunny Day. NL Exhaust
TheVixenMod:Psyshock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals !D! damage to itself X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Sunny Day. NL Exhaust

TheVixenMod:FirePunch.NAME: Fire Punch
TheVixenMod:FirePunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Burn. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Sunny: Upgrade this card this combat.

TheVixenMod:TrumpCard.NAME: Trump Card
TheVixenMod:TrumpCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Unaffected by Weak. NL If you have a common debuff the dealt damage is applied to all other enemies.
TheVixenMod:TrumpCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Weak is inverted for this card. NL If you have a common debuff the damage you dealt is applied to all other enemies as well.

TheVixenMod:Confusion.NAME: Confusion
TheVixenMod:Confusion.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals !D! damage to itself. NL Retain your rightmost attack, skill or power.
TheVixenMod:Confusion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals !D! damage to itself. NL Retain your rightmost attack, skill or power. NL Sunny: Repeat this effect.

TheVixenMod:Extrasensory.NAME: Extrasensory
TheVixenMod:Extrasensory.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals NL !D! damage to itself NL !M! times. NL Sunny: Exhaust NL !M! + !MISC! times

TheVixenMod:FireFang.NAME: Fire Fang
TheVixenMod:FireFang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !MISC! times. NL Sunny: Exhaust NL Apply !M! Burn.

TheVixenMod:Spite.NAME: Spite
TheVixenMod:Spite.DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes damage and loses Strength this turn equal to the cumulative duration of your common debuffs. NL ( !DBCD! )
TheVixenMod:Spite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy takes damage twice and loses Strength this turn equal to the cumulative duration of your common debuffs. NL ( !DBCD! )

TheVixenMod:CalmMind.NAME: Calm Mind
TheVixenMod:CalmMind.DESCRIPTION: Draw !MISC! cards. NL Sunny: Exhaust NL Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity this turn.
TheVixenMod:CalmMind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !MISC! cards. NL Retain your rightmost attack, skill or power. NL Sunny: Exhaust NL Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity this turn.

TheVixenMod:Defend_TheVixen.NAME: Defend
TheVixenMod:Defend_TheVixen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Sunny: Draw a card.

TheVixenMod:SunnyDay.NAME: Sunny Day
TheVixenMod:SunnyDay.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Sunny Day. NL Sunny and debuffed: Reduce the duration of common debuffs by 1 instead.
TheVixenMod:SunnyDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Sunny Day. NL Sunny and debuffed: Gain [E] and reduce the duration of common debuffs by 1 instead.

TheVixenMod:PsychUp.NAME: Psych Up
TheVixenMod:PsychUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength and Block equal to the Strength and Block of target enemy this turn. NL Sunny: Draw !M! cards.
TheVixenMod:PsychUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Steal target enemy's Strength and Block until end of turn. NL Sunny: Draw !M! cards.

TheVixenMod:MindReader.NAME: Mind Reader
TheVixenMod:MindReader.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block¹. If not, deal !D! damage². NL Sunny: Inflict !M! Weak¹ or Vulnerable² respectively.

TheVixenMod:Magician.NAME: Magician
TheVixenMod:Magician.DESCRIPTION: Until end of turn, whenever YOU deal damage, draw a card, gain [E] and temporarily lose !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:FirePledge.NAME: Fire Pledge
TheVixenMod:FirePledge.DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Burn, then gain Block equal to it. NL Sunny: Triple it instead. NL Exhaust.
TheVixenMod:FirePledge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double an enemy's Burn, then gain Block equal to it.  NL Sunny: Triple it instead.

TheVixenMod:LightScreen.NAME: Light Screen
TheVixenMod:LightScreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Sunny: Increase Block gained by this card by !M! this combat.

TheVixenMod:Protect.NAME: Protect
TheVixenMod:Protect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 Protectspam. NL Is !M! % less effective for each stack of Protectspam.

TheVixenMod:WillOWisp.NAME: Will-O-Wisp
TheVixenMod:WillOWisp.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Burn. NL Sunny: NL (only when possible) NL Apply it to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:CADC.NAME: Counter Attack Dash Cancel
TheVixenMod:CADC.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Sunny: Gain !M! Strength this turn.

TheVixenMod:Feint.NAME: Feint
TheVixenMod:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Sunny and Vulnerable: Remove up to !M! Vulnerable from yourself and apply as much Weak to all enemies.

TheVixenMod:Incinerate.NAME: Incinerate
TheVixenMod:Incinerate.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Gain 2 Sunny Day and !M! Strength this turn.

TheVixenMod:Hypnosis.NAME: Hypnosis
TheVixenMod:Hypnosis.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Sunny: Gain [E]

TheVixenMod:NastyPlot.NAME: Nasty Plot
TheVixenMod:NastyPlot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 Sunny Day. NL Sunny: gain [E].

TheVixenMod:Refresh.NAME: Refresh
TheVixenMod:Refresh.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the duration of common debuffs by !M!. NL Draw a card for each common debuff on you ( !DBNUM! ).

TheVixenMod:WonderRoom.NAME: Wonder Room
TheVixenMod:WonderRoom.DESCRIPTION: All current temporary Strength and Dexterity changes become permanent. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:Safeguard.NAME: Safeguard
TheVixenMod:Safeguard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Sunny Day and 1 Artifact. NL Exhaust.

TheVixenMod:Endure.NAME: Endure
TheVixenMod:Endure.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Sunny: You cannot die this turn, exhaust this card if you would.
TheVixenMod:Endure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You cannot die this turn, exhaust this card if you would.

TheVixenMod:MagicCoat.NAME: Magic Coat
TheVixenMod:MagicCoat.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain up to !M! [E] for each unique common debuff on you ( !DBNUM! ). NL (5 extra Block for each one above the limit)

TheVixenMod:Agility.NAME: Agility
TheVixenMod:Agility.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, retain your !M! rightmost attack, skill or power cards. NL Sunny: Gain !B! Block.
TheVixenMod:Agility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, retain your !M! rightmost attack, skill or power cards. NL Gain !B! Block.

TheVixenMod:ClearSky.NAME: Clear Sky
TheVixenMod:ClearSky.DESCRIPTION: Sunny Day is not consumed this turn. NL Exhaust
TheVixenMod:ClearSky.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Sunny Day. NL Sunny Day is not consumed this turn. NL Exhaust

TheVixenMod:Copycat.NAME: Copycat
TheVixenMod:Copycat.DESCRIPTION: Repeat the last card you played. NL Exhaust NL Sunny: NL Shuffle a copy of it into your discard pile.
TheVixenMod:Copycat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Repeat the last card you played. It costs 1. NL Exhaust NL Sunny: NL Shuffle a copy of it into your discard pile.

TheVixenMod:Barrier.NAME: Barrier
TheVixenMod:Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block now and next turn X times. NL Apply !M! Frail to yourself.

TheVixenMod:PsychoShift.NAME: Psycho Shift
TheVixenMod:PsychoShift.DESCRIPTION: Absorb all common debuffs from one enemy. NL Heal for !M! for each common debuffstack on you.
TheVixenMod:PsychoShift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy all common debuffs from one enemy. NL Heal for !M! for each common debuffstack on you.

TheVixenMod:PerishSong.NAME: Perish Song
TheVixenMod:PerishSong.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself and an enemy. NL Apply burn equal to the cumulative duration of your common debuffs.

TheVixenMod:TrickRoom.NAME: Trick Room
TheVixenMod:TrickRoom.DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns, when Vulnerable, you take 33% less damage instead of 50% more. NL Exhaust
TheVixenMod:TrickRoom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For !M! turns (increased by your Weak), when Vulnerable, you take 25% less damage instead of 25% more. NL Exhaust

TheVixenMod:DoubleTeam.NAME: Double Team
TheVixenMod:DoubleTeam.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Unaffected by Frail. NL Sunny: Gain 1 extra Block for each unique common debuff on you.
TheVixenMod:DoubleTeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Frail's effect is reverted for this card. NL Sunny: Gain 1 extra Block for each unique common debuff on you.

TheVixenMod:BurnUp.NAME: Burn Up
TheVixenMod:BurnUp.DESCRIPTION: Consume all your Sunny Day. NL Draw a card and gain [E] for each stack ( !SUN! ). Exhaust
TheVixenMod:BurnUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consume all your Sunny Day. NL Draw a card and gain [E] for each stack ( !SUN! ), then gain !M! Sunny Day. Exhaust

TheVixenMod:Curse.NAME: Curse
TheVixenMod:Curse.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. Draw a card. NL Sunny: Exhaust NL Copy your Weak and Vulnerable equally split to all enemies.
TheVixenMod:Curse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to yourself. Draw !M! cards. NL Sunny: Exhaust NL Copy your Weak and Vulnerable equally split to all enemies.

TheVixenMod:Disable.NAME: Disable
TheVixenMod:Disable.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !MISC! Strength this turn. NL Sunny: Purge NL Choose a card from your Exhaustpile and add it to your Hand.
TheVixenMod:Disable.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose !MISC! Strength this turn. NL Sunny: Exhaust NL Choose !M! cards from your Exhaustpile and add it to your Hand.

TheVixenMod:TailWhip.NAME: Tail Whip
TheVixenMod:TailWhip.DESCRIPTION: Apply !MISC! Vulnerable. NL Sunny: Exhaust NL Apply !M! Burn. NL Gain [E]

TheVixenMod:Amnesia.NAME: Amnesia
TheVixenMod:Amnesia.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Sunny: Exhaust NL Increase Block gained by !M! % and NL gain !B2! Block next turn.

TheVixenMod:FutureSight.NAME: Future Sight
TheVixenMod:FutureSight.DESCRIPTION: Play a card from your Drawpile. NL Sunny: Exhaust NL Play up to X cards from your Drawpile.
TheVixenMod:FutureSight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play a card from your Drawpile. NL Sunny: Exhaust NL Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile, then play up to X cards from it.

TheVixenMod:Wish.NAME: Wish
TheVixenMod:Wish.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, heal for half the hp you lose this turn. NL Exhaust
TheVixenMod:Wish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next turn, heal for half the hp you lose this turn. NL Gain !M! Buffer. NL Exhaust

TheVixenMod:SynergyBurst.NAME: Synergy Burst
TheVixenMod:SynergyBurst.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Shuffle a Psycracker into your discard pile.
TheVixenMod:SynergyBurst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Shuffle an upgraded Psycracker into your discard pile.

TheVixenMod:Blaze.NAME: Blaze
TheVixenMod:Blaze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL If you are at or below 50% Health, whenever you apply Burn, apply !M! more Burn.

TheVixenMod:Telepathy.NAME: Telepathy
TheVixenMod:Telepathy.DESCRIPTION: Enemies deal !M! more damage to themselves. NL Gain 1 Dexterity.

TheVixenMod:Substitute.NAME: Substitute
TheVixenMod:Substitute.DESCRIPTION: Take !SUB! damage. NL Gain !25%! Substitute. NL Sunny: Gain 1 Artifact.

TheVixenMod:Guts.NAME: Guts
TheVixenMod:Guts.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Guts. NL At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to the cumulative duration of your common debuffs.

TheVixenMod:FlameBody.NAME: Flame Body
TheVixenMod:FlameBody.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, increase the next Burn that enemy receives by !M! until their next turn.

TheVixenMod:Dazzling.NAME: Dazzling
TheVixenMod:Dazzling.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card's Sunny effect is triggered, gain !M! Block.

TheVixenMod:Drought.NAME: Drought
TheVixenMod:Drought.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Sunny Day, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

TheVixenMod:Analytic.NAME: Analytic
TheVixenMod:Analytic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !M! or less cards in a turn, gain 1 Sunny Day.

TheVixenMod:Defiant.NAME: Defiant
TheVixenMod:Defiant.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Defiant. NL (End of turn, gain up to N Sunny Day, one for each debuff you were inflicted with this turn.)
TheVixenMod:Defiant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Defiant. NL (End of turn, gain up to N Sunny Day, one for each debuff you were inflicted with this turn.)

TheVixenMod:Psycracker.NAME: Psycracker
TheVixenMod:Psycracker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to NL a random enemy !M! times. NL Lose Synergy Burst's effect. NL Sunny: Remove all Debuffs from yourself. NL Purge

TheVixenMod:InfernoOverdrive.NAME: Inferno Overdrive
TheVixenMod:InfernoOverdrive.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times to all enemies. NL Exhaust

TheVixenMod:UmbreonSnarl.NAME: Umbreon
TheVixenMod:UmbreonSnarl.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust Retain

TheVixenMod:UmbreonFoulPlay.NAME: Umbreon
TheVixenMod:UmbreonFoulPlay.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy deals !D! damage to itself. NL Exhaust Retain

TheVixenMod:UmbreonRefresh.NAME: Umbreon
TheVixenMod:UmbreonRefresh.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust Retain

TheVixenMod:UmbreonHelpingHand.NAME: Umbreon
TheVixenMod:UmbreonHelpingHand.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of all cards in your hand by !M!. NL Exhaust Retain

TheVixenMod:BossBurn.NAME: Burn
TheVixenMod:BossBurn.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, draw a card. NL While in your drawpile, discardpile or hand, you take !M! more damage. NL Downgrades instead of exhausting.
